title: Number of M & A transactions in Asia 2015 - 2017 , by country
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of deals on the Y-axis for 9 different Quarters for 4 groups Australia, China/Hong Kong, India, and Japan that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 9 Quarters, the Number of deals for Australia have been grew whereas lowered for Quarter.
Quarter Q4 2016 had the maximum Number of deals among all 4 groups, and it was for China/Hong Kong. The minimum Number of deals was observed in Quarter Q3 2017 for India.
In Quarter Q4 2016, Australia had the highest Number of deals among all 9 Quarters and it has the lowest Number of deals in Quarter Q1 2017.

Over the 9 Quarters, the Number of deals for Australia have been grew whereas lowered for Quarter.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of deals on the Y-axis for 9 different Quarters for 4 groups Australia, China/Hong Kong, India, and Japan that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 9 Quarters, the Number of deals for Australia have been grew whereas lowered for Quarter.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 9 different Quarters on X-axis for 4 groups Australia, China/Hong Kong, India, and Japan. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of deals.
Over the 9 Quarters, the Number of deals for Australia have been grew whereas lowered for Quarter.
Out of all 4 groups, China/Hong Kong had the highest Number of deals in Quarter Q4 2016 and India had the lowest Number of deals in Quarter Q3 2017.
Among all the Quarters, Australia had the highest Number of deals 404.0 in Quarter Q4 2016 and lowest value 321.0 in Quarter Q1 2017.
There is a gap of 83.0 between the highest and lowest Number of deals found for Australia in Quarter Q4 2016 and Q1 2017.
Among the groups, China/Hong Kong had the biggest difference in Number of deals. Where the maximum Number of deals was 1.45 times larger than the minimum Number of deals.
China/Hong Kong had the maximum Number of deals out of all 4 groups in Quarter Q4 2016 followed by China/Hong Kong in Q4 2016, and the minimum Number of deals is found for India in Q3 2017.
Averaging all 4 groups Australia, China/Hong Kong, India, and Japan, the Quarter Q4 2016 is the maximum Number of deals and Q2 2016 is the minimum Number of deals.
